overview:
As the driver of business development at YellowHammer, Appelbaum is responsible for both attracting new advertising clients and managing and satisfying current ones. Dedicated to premium service and a deep understanding of each client’s context and market, Appelbaum’s team focuses on gathering in-depth data about customer trends and tastes, compiling information on the competitive market landscape that each client (and potential client) is involved in – and utilizing that data to generate greater client ROI.

Appelbaum broke into online advertising as an affiliate manager at Epic Media, where he was named “rookie of the year” within his first six months, and quickly rose to Senior Network Manager. At Epic he worked closely with the agency’s largest advertisers on their overall distribution strategy, trained other Network Managers, and continuously exceeded his quarterly revenue goals.

Appelbaum is a graduate of the University of Wisconsin – Madison.
